\usepackage{upquote}
\usepackage{xcolor}

\def\postbreak{\raisebox{0ex}[0ex][0ex]{\ensuremath{\hookrightarrow\space}}}

\lstset{
  columns=fixed,
  basewidth=.5em,
  basicstyle=\ttfamily,
  commentstyle=\color{gray}\textit,
  keywordstyle=\lst@ifdisplaystyle\color{purple}\ttfamily\fi,
  stringstyle=\ttfamily\color{olive},
  numberstyle=\color{olive},
  typestyle=\lst@ifdisplaystyle\color{teal}\ttfamily\fi,
  constructorstyle=\lst@ifdisplaystyle\color{teal}\ttfamily\fi,
  showstringspaces=false,
  breaklines=true,
  breakatwhitespace=true,
  postbreak=\postbreak,
  breakindent=0pt,
  upquote=true,
  xleftmargin=8pt,
  xrightmargin=8pt,
  aboveskip=12pt,
  belowskip=12pt,
  lineskip=0pt,
  literate={\$$}{{\$$}}1,
  mathescape=false,
  escapechar=@,
  language=purescript
}
